name: Pre-sql
value:
select case when CNT > 1 then CNT/0 else CNT end VALIDATION_CHECK
from
(
SELECT case when row_num is null then dummy else row_num end CNT FROM
(
SELECT 1 as dummy,row_num FROM
(
select ROW_NUMBER()OVER(PARTITION BY sucursal_id,rut_corredor,company,agno,mes order by sucursal_id) row_num
from cdp_stg_dwh.stg_corredor
)SRC where row_num >1
)SRC1
)SRC2
